item.title: FIDO2
item.description: According to the Verizon 2017 Data Breach Investigations Report more than 80% of all data breaches can be attributed to weak and/or stolen passwords. Despite all of their weaknesses passwords are still the de facto way to authenticate users because no one has come up with a viable alternative. Now, however, there is a new(-ish) kid in town. FIDO2 (more commonly known as WebAuthentication or WebAuthn) is a standard developed by the FIDO (Fast IDentity Online) alliance.
